name: SecurityGroup
shortDesc: Creates an Amazon EC2 security group. To create a VPC security group, use the VpcId property.

properties.name: SecurityGroupEgress
properties.desc: A list of Amazon EC2 security group egress rules.
properties.type: List of EC2 Security Group Rule

properties.name: SecurityGroupIngress
properties.desc: A list of Amazon EC2 security group ingress rules.
properties.type: List of EC2 Security Group Rule

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: The tags that you want to attach to the resource.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.desc: The physical ID of the VPC. Can be obtained by using a reference to an AWS::EC2::VPC, such as: { "Ref" : "myVPC" }.

attributes.name: GroupId
attributes.desc: The group ID of the specified security group, such as sg-94b3a1f6.
